name: Tomb for Two
description:
Current Controls:

Keyboard:

- MOVE: WASD

- SWAP: V on Keyboard

- INTERACT/OPEN DOORS: E

- SHOOTING: Left Click

- AIM: Mouse

Controller:
- MOVE: Left Joystick 

- SWAP: Button North controller (both players must be holding the button for it to work)

- INTERACT/OPEN DOORS: Button West

- SHOOTING: RT

- AIM: Right joystick
